pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He entertains the belief that the second world war is inevitable before 1936.
sentences.chinese: 他相信1936年以前第二次世界大战是不能避免的。

sentences.english: Japanese-Americans were rounded up and interned during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战期间，日本裔美国人遭到集体关押。

sentences.english: The custom began during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 这种习俗始于第二次世界大战期间。

sentences.english: 1942- the World War Two siege of Bataan began.
sentences.chinese: 1942年的今天，第二次世界大战，开始围攻巴丹。

sentences.english: He received severe injuries and nearly lost his life during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 在第二次世界大战期间他身负重伤险些丧命。

sentences.english: 5】The film is，as it were,a true reflection of the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，这部电影是第二次世界大战的真实写照。

sentences.english: He was caught up in the anti-fascist movement during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 在第二次世界大战期间他投身于反法西斯运动中。

sentences.english: The Second World War bled white many countries in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战耗尽了许多欧洲国家的财力物力。
第二次世界大战使“雷达”一词家喻户晓。

sentences.english: World War II broke out in 1939.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战是1939年爆发的。

sentences.english: Our history textbooks only go up to the World War Ⅱ.
sentences.chinese: 我们的历史教科书仅写到第二次世界大战。

sentences.english: Henry was mustered out of service after the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 亨利在第二次世界大战后退役。

sentences.english: My father ran out of capital as the storm of clouds of the Second world war began to gather.
sentences.chinese: 当第二次世界大战前夕战云密布时，我父亲资金告罄。

sentences.english: The Japanese garrison on Wake surrendered at the end of World War II.
sentences.chinese: 关于日本驻军投降叫醒在第二次世界大战结束。

sentences.english: We fought with the Soviet Red Army during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战期间我们和苏联红军并肩战斗。

sentences.english: Torpedo boats played an important role during World War Two.
sentences.chinese: 鱼雷艇在第二次世界大战中发挥了重要作用。

pinyin: Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Pacific War between Japan and the US, 1941-1945

Battle of Stalingrad (1942-1943), decisive battle of Second World War and one of the bloodiest battles in history, when the Germans failed to take Stalingrad, were then trapped and destroyed by Soviet forces
pinyin: Si1 da4 lin2 ge2 le4 Zhan4 yi4

definition: the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan
